name: Danielle Benzon
offering: Communication Training, Content Creation, Online Education for Business Owners, Podcast Services, Presentation Skills, Public Speaking, Speaker Training, TedX Talks
what_you_do: The Inspired Speaker Academy provides speaking training for entrepreneurs, authors, and content creators, focusing on techniques to enhance stage presence, vocal skills, and personal branding.
who_you_serve: The Academy serves speakers who wish to share their message on international stages, including entrepreneurs, authors, and video content creators.
current_projects: Membership program for the Authentic Speakers Training Portal
